Title: Colophon
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Inscriptions: [Transliteration] tamma al-kitāb bi-'awn Allāh al-Malik al-Wahhāb wa-husn tawfīqih fī yawm al-arba'ā' /1/ thālith 'ishrīn [sic] shahr Dhī al-Qaʿdah sanat khams wa-thalāthīn wa- /2/ tis'imi<'>ah min al-hijrah al-nabawīyah al-mustafawīyah sl'm (='allá Allāh 'alayhi wa-sallama) /3/
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.622 contains a colophon.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; Central Asia; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Muhammad 'Ali Shirazi ibn […] Muhammad Qasim Shirazi, 1250 (?) [mode of acquisition unknown]; Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Amir Khusraw Dihlavi (died ca. 729 AH/AD 1328)
